subject: Baseball
Steroids
Athletics and Sports
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: Barry Bonds is rapidly approaching Hank Aaron’s revered home run record, and Bud Selig, the commissioner of Major League Baseball, must decide how to respond.
snippet: Barry Bonds is rapidly approaching Hank Aaron’s revered home run record, and Bud Selig, the commissioner of Major League Baseball, must decide how to respond.
